name: mad-agents-skills (MADTeacher)
description: [项目级] Collection of agent skills for AI assistants working with Dart and Flutter projects。来源: https://github.com/MADTeacher/mad-agents-skills

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content: This repository contains a set of specialized skills for Dart and Flutter development, organized according to the open [**Agent Skills**](https://agentskills.io/home) standard.

genes.title: 项目结构
genes.content:
LICENSE
README.md
README.ru.md
agents-md-generator
agents-md-generator/SKILL.md
agents-md-generator/references
dart-drift
dart-drift/SKILL.md
dart-drift/references
flutter-adaptive-ui
flutter-adaptive-ui/SKILL.md
flutter-adaptive-ui/assets
flutter-adaptive-ui/references
flutter-animations
flutter-animations/SKILL.md
flutter-animations/assets
flutter-animations/references
flutter-architecture
flutter-architecture/SKILL.md
flutter-architecture/assets

genes.title: 使用方法
genes.content: This repository follows the open [Agent Skills](https://agentskills.io/home) format — a standard for giving AI agents new capabilities and expertise. Agent Skills are folders with instructions, scripts, and resources that agents can discover and use to complete tasks more accurately and efficiently.
